GetActionType.Description: Returns the type of the action that was performed

GetClickedBlock.Description: Returns the block that was interacted with

GetHand.Description: Returns the hand used to interact

GetInteractionPoint.Description: Returns the exact location that the interaction occured at

GetItem.Description: Returns the item used in the interaction event

InvolvedBlock.Description: Returns if a block was used in the interaction

InvolvedItem.Description: Returns if a item was used in the interaction

IsBlockInHand.Description: Returns if the interaction was a block placement event

ShouldInteract.Description: Sets whether the playee should interact or not

ShouldUseInteractedBlock.Description: Sets whether the player should use the interacted block or not (ALLOW, DENY)

ShouldUseItemInHand.Description: Sets whether the player should use the item in their hand (ALLOW, DENY)
